DOC.brief_summary: The effectiveness antimicrobial prophylaxis ( AMP ) prevention surgical site infection ( SSI ) follow thyroid parathyroid surgery remain uncertain . Present prospective randomize control study ( Ito-RCT1 ) assess effectiveness AMP clean neck surgery associate thyroid parathyroid disease .
DOC.detailed_description: Between November 2010 April 2012 , 2164 consecutive patient agree attend randomize control study enrol . All participant receive surgery thyroid parathyroid disease Ito Hospital randomize three group ; Group A ( n=541 ) : operation AMP ( PIPC , piperacillin sodium ) , Group B ( n=541 ) : operation AMP ( CEZ , cefazolin sodium ) , Group C ( n=1082 ) : operation without AMP . Exclusion criterion - Patients agree attend randomize control study . - Patients received operation include mediastinum sternotomy . - Patients received operation include additional resection trachea , esophagus larynx . - Patients receive re-operation post-operative bleeding . - Patients know allergy cephem penicillin .
